short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find new sites without having to fight through SEO.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension finds similar links to a website you're already on. Once installed, all you need to do it browse the web like you already do, open the panel in the bottom right, and Browser Buddy will recommend links.
